title: Project Team
description: Basic team structure for a project

teamId.description: A unique identifier for a team
teamId.$comment: This is a GUID, generated when a team is instantiated.

teamTitle.$comment: This value is defined during creation of a team template.

teamDescription.$comment: This value is defined during creation of a team template.

teamRoleList.description: List of team roles and people assigned to that role
teamRoleList.$comment: Array of team member objects. These values are defined during creation of a process template.

teamRoleObject.description: Team roles and people assigned to role

teamRole.$comment: Values are defined during team template creation.

teamMembersInRole.description: List of people assigned to role and dates they began and ended in role
teamMembersInRole.$comment: Team members can added to role after team is instantiated

teamMemberObject.description: People on a team and dates on the team

teamMemberName.$comment: Value is set when person is added to team

teamMemberID.$comment: Value is set when person is added to team

teamMemberStartDate.$comment: Value is set when person is added to team

teamMemberEndDate.$comment: Value is set when person leaves team
